name: Crazy Penguin Maker
description:
Crazy Penguin Maker

The funny dress up game Crazy Penguin Maker is now available for iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch!

Give this crazy penguin a frantic new look using the latest winter fashion. Of course, you create a nice and warm outfit, it's always very cold this time of year at the North Pole.

-------------------------------------------
● TASTY GRAPHICS that will leave you hungry for more
● EASY AND FUN to play, To maker own cartoon characters
● MORE CLOTHES,100+ clothes for make funny
● TOP-NOTCH performance! Animated Penguin, effects!
● FREE updates with new clothes, Jewels, and more!
--------------------------------------------

Last, but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Crazy Penguin Maker!
